Text:
This torrent upload alleges to be The 3 DVD PBS themed repacked release, from  the BBC Series Battlefield. It was broadcast in the UK as 2 hour episodes and in the US as 2 part 1 hour episodes.

THIS upload is NOT complete!!  Episodes should consist of two hour programs. 

One Third of this DVD is missing from this torrent!!!!!!!

disc 1 Battle for Russia (120 min.) --  Only Part 1 is in this upload (60 min.)
disc 2 Battle for Stalingrad (120 min.) -- Only Part 1 is in this upload (60 min.)
disc 3 Battle for Berlin (120 min).

[url]http://www.shoppbs.org/product/index.jsp?productId=4416628&cp=&sr=1&kw=battlefield+russia+the+eastern+front&origkw=Battlefield+Russia%3A+The+Eastern+Front&parentPage=search[/url]

[url]http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Battlefield_%28TV_series%29[/url]

[url]http://www.imdb.com/title/tt1748705/[/url]

[url]http://www.worldcat.org/title/battlefield-russia-the-eastern-front/oclc/712649232&referer=brief_results[/url]

The complete series is available at MVGroup

Thanks for the info reedski, found this: Battlefield.Complete.Episode1-30 a repack of MvGroup stuff: http://thepiratebay.se/torrent/3774695/Discovery.Channel.Battlefield.Complete.Episode1-30.XviD.MP3.MVGr

Thanks for the effort dynasty101, I see many interesting uploads in your profile!
